General.Name: Regency Ceramics Limited
General.Description: Regency Ceramics Limited manufactures and sells ceramic floor and wall tiles in India and internationally. It offers glazed vitrified, parking, and heavy-duty tiles for high traffic areas, as well as imported and duro tiles, and tile highlighters. The company also exports its products. Regency Ceramics Limited was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
General.Address: N.N.House, Chirag Ali Lane, Hyderabad, India, 500001
